com.xuggle.mediatool.demos
Class DecodeAndPlayAudioAndVideo

java.lang.Object
  com.xuggle.mediatool.AMediaListenerMixin
      com.xuggle.mediatool.MediaListenerAdapter
          com.xuggle.mediatool.demos.DecodeAndPlayAudioAndVideo
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMediaListener
public class DecodeAndPlayAudioAndVideo
extends MediaListenerAdapter

Using IMediaReader, takes a media container, finds the first video stream, decodes that stream, and then plays the audio and video.

Constructor Summary
DecodeAndPlayAudioAndVideo()
           
 
Method Summary
static void main(String[] args)
          Takes a media container (file) as the first argument, opens it, plays audio as quickly as it can, and opens up a Swing window and displays video frames with roughly the right timing.
 
Methods inherited from class com.xuggle.mediatool.MediaListenerAdapter
onAddStream, onAudioSamples, onClose, onCloseCoder, onFlush, onOpen, onOpenCoder, onReadPacket, onVideoPicture, onWriteHeader, onWritePacket, onWriteTrailer

Method Detail

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Takes a media container (file) as the first argument, opens it, plays audio as quickly as it can, and opens up a Swing window and displays video frames with roughly the right timing.

Parameters:
